headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Lam Research (LRCX): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Lam Research (LRCX) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
